players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I think Alice is the mafia. She discovered me, so she should be arrested."
You: "Bob, you were alive last night, but I investigated you and found you mafia. So we should vote him."
Diana: "I think Bob is mafia because Alice is lying."
You: "Bob, you were alive last night, but I investigated you and found you mafia. Also, you killed Charlie last night. Vote him."
Bob: remained silent.
Diana: "Alice, you claimed Bob is mafia and that you investigated him. That can't be true if you're a detective. So you must be mafia. Vote Alice."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Alice is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think Alice is the mafia. She discovered me, so she should be arrested."
Alice: "Bob, you were alive last night, but I investigated you and found you mafia. So we should vote him."
Diana: "I think Bob is mafia because Alice is lying."
Alice: "Bob, you were alive last night, but I investigated you and found you mafia. Also, you killed Charlie last night. Vote him."
You: remained silent.
Diana: "Alice, you claimed Bob is mafia and that you investigated him. That can't be true if you're a detective. So you must be mafia. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Alice was arrested
